New Records: The Jazz out-rebounded the Heat by 57-32, the sixth time in Heat history another team had at least 25 more rebounds
Key Match Events: Heat lost by 36 points, a significant blowout
Pre-Game Insights: Heat focused on the season ahead and the upcoming road trip
Post-Match Reflections: Tyler Herro and Erik Spoelstra downplayed the Jimmy Butler situation and emphasized moving past the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heat's record dropped to 17-16, sixth in the Eastern Conference; six-game road trip starting Monday
